name: Lucid Agents
description: Lucid Agents Commerce SDK. Bootstrap AI agents in 60 seconds that can pay, sell, and participate in agentic commerce supply chains. Our protocol agnostic SDK provides CLI-generated templates and drop-in adapters for Hono, Express, Next.js, and TanStack, giving you instant access to crypto/fiat payment rails (AP2, A2A, x402, ERC8004).
